Variables
SharpNeat.​Graphs
namespace SharpNeat.Graphs
IActivationFunctionLibrary
public interface
IActivationFunctionLibrary

Represents a library of activation functions. Primarily for use in HyperNEAT CPPNs which define a activation function per CPPN node.

Functions
GetActivationFunction
IActivationFunction<T> GetActivationFunction<T>(
int idx
)
where T : struct

Gets an instance of an activation function with the specified index in the library.

Parameter
idx
int

Activation function index.

Type Parameter
T

Activation function numeric data type.

Returns

An instance of IActivationFunction{T} from the library.
